Contents.Content: select TOP 1 c.bqdm,a.sqrq '申请日期', a.patid, a.cwdm as '床号', a.hzxm as '姓名', c.sex '性别', case when c.birth = ' ' then ' ' else convert(varchar,datediff(yy,c.birth,getdate())) end as '年龄', a.ssdm,a.ssmc as '手术名称', a.mzdm,a.mzmc as '麻醉名称', e.name '主刀医生', d.name as '病区名称', (case when a.jzssbz=1 then '急诊手术' when a.jzssbz=2 then '择期手术' else '普通手术' end) as '手术类别', a.blh as '住院号', a.ssksdm,b.name as '手术室', a.jlzt,a.roomno as '手术间', a.sstc as '手术台次', a.aprq as '安排日期', a.ksdm, a.djrq '登记日期', a.yzxh , --通知日期 a.tzrq '通知日期', a.sqrq,--时间 (select top 1 f.zdmc from SS_SSZDK f(nolock) where zdlb=0 and zdlx=0 and a.xh=f.ssxh) as '术前诊断' from SS_SSDJK a (nolock), SS_SSDMK b (nolock), ZY_BRSYK c (nolock), ZY_BQDMK d (nolock), YY_ZGBMK e (nolock) where a.syxh = c.syxh and c.brzt not in (3,8,9) and c.bqdm = d.id and b.id=a.ssksdm and a.ysdm*=e.id {0} order by a.sqrq desc

select --病人基本信息 br.PatientCode as VALUE,--病人编号 br.PatientCode as INPATIENTCODE,--病人编号 br.PatientName as NAME, --病人姓名 br.PatientName as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 case when br.PatientSex=0 then '男' else '女' end as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 year(getdate())-substring(br.PatientBirthday,1,4) as PATIENTAGE,--年龄 --住院信息 zy.InPatientCode as SocialSecurityCard, --住院号 zy.WardArea as WARDAREA,--病区 zy.BedNumber as BEDNO --床位
from v_disinfect_patientinfo br left join v_disinfect_inpatientinfos zy on br.PatientCode=zy.PatientCode where 1=1 {0}

select --手术信息 br.PatientCode as VALUE,--病人编号 br.PatientName as NAME, --病人姓名 br.PatientName as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 case when br.PatientSex=0 then '男' else '女' end as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 year(getdate())-substring(br.PatientBirthday,1,4) as PATIENTAGE,--年龄 ss.OPERAT_DEPT_CODE as OPERATIONDEPARTMENT --科室 from v_disinfect_patientinfo br left join v_disinfect_operationinfos ss on br.MedicalRecordCode=ss.MedicalRecordCode where 1=1 {0}

select top 10 g.patid , g.ghsjh ,--挂号时间号 g.ghxh ,--挂号序号 g.fph ,--发票号 g.hzxm ,--姓名 g.blh --病历号 ,g.cardno --磁卡号 ,f.sex -- 性别 ,case when f.birth = ' ' then ' ' else convert(varchar,datediff(yy,f.birth ,getdate())) end as '年龄' from VW_MZBRJSK g(nolock),SF_BRXXK f(nolock) where g.cardno=f.cardno {0} order by gh.ghsjh Desc

select --病人基本信息 g.fph as VALUE,--病人编号 g.hzxm as NAME, --病人姓名 g.hzxm as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 f.sex as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 case when f.birth = ' ' then ' ' else convert(varchar,datediff(yy,f.birth ,getdate())) end as PATIENTAGE,--年龄
g.ghxh as REGISTERCODE, --挂号系统编号 g.ghsjh as REGISTERDATETIME --挂号时间 from VW_MZBRJSK g(nolock),SF_BRXXK f(nolock) where g.cardno=f.cardno {0} order by gh.ghsjh Desc
